    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Forces agissant sur une étoile pendant ses étapes de  sa  vie</string>
            <string language="en">Forces acting on a star during its life stages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzwingt das Fungieren auf einem Stern während 
seiner Lebenstadien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força agir em uma estrela durante seus estágios
da vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza comportarsi su una stella durante le 
relative fasi di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια
των σταδίων ζωής του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza actuar en una estrella durante sus etapas 
de la vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur trois illustrations montrant les  forces agissant sur une étoile pendant ses étapes de la vie.  Les forces vers l'extérieur dues à la pression de l'énergie  libérée par des réactions de fusion nucléaire tendront à faire s'élargir l'étoile.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing the forces acting on a star during its life stages. The outward forces due to the pressure from the energy released by nuclear fusion reactions will tend to make the star expand.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">L'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">forces</string>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">haute température</string>
            <string language="en">high temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étapes de la vie</string>
            <string language="en">life stages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fusion nucléaire</string>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pression</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, welche 
die Kräfte fungieren auf einem Stern während seiner Lebenstadien 
zeigen. Die nachaußengerichteten Kräfte wegen des Drucks von 
der Energie, die durch Kernfusionreaktionen freigegeben wird, neigen, 
den Stern erweitern zu lassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram as 
forças que agem em uma estrela durante seus estágios da vida. 
As forças externas  devido à pressão da energia liberada por 
reações da fusão nuclear tenderão a fazer a estrela expandir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano le forze che si comportano su una stella durante le relative 
fasi di vita. Le forze esterne dovuto la pressione dall'energia 
liberata dalle reazioni di fusione nucleare tenderanno a fare la 
stella espandersi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τις 
δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια των 
σταδίων ζωής του. Οι εξωτερικές δυνάμεις λόγω στην πίεση 
από την ενέργεια που εκδίδεται από τις αντιδράσεις πυρηνικής 
τήξης θα τείνουν να κάνουν το αστέρι να επεκταθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran las fuerzas que actúan en una estrella durante sus etapas de
la vida. Las fuerzas exteriores  debido a la presión de la 
energía release/versión por reacciones de la fusión nuclear 
tenderán para hacer que la estrella se amplía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hochtemperatur</string>
          </keyword>
